summary: This bill, the Comprehensive Addiction and Recovery Justice Grant Reauthorization Act, aims to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968. It focuses on reauthorizing the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Grant Program of the Department of Justice. The bill's key provisions include modifications to the grant's funding timeline, specifically updating the funding years from 2017-2023 to 2026-2030, and adjusting the funding amounts appropriately.
